---
title: "Félidos de Costa Rica"
format: 
  dashboard:
    orientation: columns
---

```{r}
#| label: carga-paquetes

library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(DT)
library(plotly)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(leafem)
```


```{r}
#| label: carga-datos

felidos <- 
  st_read(
    "felidos.csv",
    options = c(
      "X_POSSIBLE_NAMES=decimalLongitude", 
      "Y_POSSIBLE_NAMES=decimalLatitude"),
    quiet = TRUE
    )

st_crs(felidos) <- 4326
```

## Column {width=50%}

```{r}
#| label: mapa
#| title: "Mapa de distribución"

leaflet() |>
  setView(
    lng = -84,
    lat = 10,
    zoom = 7
  ) |>
  addTiles(group = "OSM") |>
  addProviderTiles(provider = providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "Imágenes satelitales") |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = felidos,
    color = "black",
    fillColor = "red",
    radius = 4,
    stroke = FALSE,
    group = "Félidos"
  ) |>
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("OSM", "Imágenes satelitales"),
    overlayGroups = c("Félidos")
  ) |>
  addResetMapButton() |>
  addSearchOSM() |>
  addMouseCoordinates() |>
  addMiniMap(position = "bottomright") |>
  addFullscreenControl()
```

## Column {width=50%}

```{r}
#| label: tabla
#| title: "Lista de registros de presencia"

felidos |>
  st_drop_geometry() |>
  select(species, decimalLongitude, decimalLatitude, stateProvince) |>
  datatable()
```

```{r}
#| label: grafico
#| title: "Cantidad de registros por provincia"

grafico_ggplot2 <-
felidos |>
  st_drop_geometry() |>
  filter(stateProvince == "San José" |
           stateProvince == "Alajuela" |
           stateProvince == "Cartago" |
           stateProvince == "Heredia") |>
  group_by(stateProvince) |>
  summarize(n = n()) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = stateProvince, y = n)) +
  geom_col()

ggplotly(grafico_ggplot2) |> config(locale = "es")
```
